creator: chris@christopherschultz.net
text: It would be nice to see a message confirming the initialization of OpenSSL including its version number.

creator: chris@christopherschultz.net
text: For completeness, this was fixed in trunk and 7.0.x and will be included in 7.0.28. Back-ported to 6.0.x and will be included in 6.0.36.
